common.EROR_ENDDATE_BEFORE_STARTDATE: End date cannot be earlier than start date.
common.EROR_STARTDATE_BEFORE_ENDDATE: Start date cannot be after end date.

info.TITLE: About HOAY
info.TXT_ABOUT: HOAY ("How old are you") is an app to calculate ages in years, months and days.
info.TXT_CODE: It is built with the JavaScript Framework <open-external url='http://angularjs.org/'>AngularJS</open-external> and <open-external url='http://phonegap.com/'>PhoneGap</open-external>. All <open-external url='https://github.com/sectore/hoay'>source code</open-external> is available at <open-external url='https://github.com/sectore/hoay'>GitHub</open-external>.
